mysql-router-k8s/2   maintenance  idle   10.1.91.206         
mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.91.200         
'
 +  where 'Model  Controller          Cloud/Region        Version  SLA          Timestamp

App               Version                  Status   Scale  Charm             Channel      Rev  Address         Exposed  Message

mysql-test-app    0.0.2                    active       1  mysql-test-app    latest/edge   63  10.152.183.63   no       

Unit                 Workload     Agent  Address      Ports  Message
mysql-k8s/0*         active       idle   10.1.91.202         Primary
mysql-router-k8s/0*  active       idle   10.1.91.203         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0
mysql-router-k8s/1   active       idle   10.1.91.204         Router 8.0.37 running (restart pending); Charmed operator 1.2+31518a0

mysql-test-app/0*    active       idle   10.1.91.200         
' = get_juju_status('test')

 +      where <juju.model.Model object at 0x7f67120a5d80> = <pytest_operator.plugin.OpsTest object at 0x7f671247efe0>.model
